cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an average 2009 Nissan Pathfinder with only 100000 miles on it. Plastic seats, power everything.
This is a below average 2015 Nissan Sentra with only 1000 miles on it. Leather everything, power nothing.
This vehicle is the definition of mediocrity.
It may not look very good, but at least it's fast as hell.  Interior smell: tolerable.
This vehicle is needlessly fast.  You will seriously never have the opportunity to use the full potential of this vehicle unless you own your own racetrack.
